caption.p: African medicinal plant extracts with antivirulence activities

fn.p: 1 All plant names and families were verified through the Medicinal Plant Names Services (MPNS) of Kew Royal Botanic Gardens ( https://www.kew.org/science/our-science/science-services/medicinal-plant-names-services) and, if not described in, MPNS through the Plant List portal ( http://www.theplantlist.org/); 2 ↗: Promotion; ↘: Inhibition; ↔: no impact; NC: not communicated.
